main event: A large, round, glowing object was observed descending to about 1500 feet, then darting up and seeming to explode, casting off fragments of sparks. No sound was heard.
interesting points: The object was sighted only by one individual, who was not deemed a completely reliable observer.
The sighting appears to have been some type of natural phenomenon, possibly a meteor or bolide.
There is no evidence that it was an aircraft or unidentified flying object.
The object made no noise whatsoever.
The witness maintained that what they saw was not an aircraft of known configuration.
